*R/gf_interface.R*

## gf_persist

## Description
Persist the GraphFrame 


## Usage
```r
gf_persist(x, storage_level = "MEMORY_AND_DISK") 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| x | An object coercable to a GraphFrame (typically, a `gf_graphframe`). |
| storage_level | The storage level to be used. Please view the [Spark Documentation](http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/programming-guide.html#rdd-persistence)<br>for information on what storage levels are accepted. |
